website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a versatile conditioner that can be rinsed out or left on the hair, this awesome-smelling product is a good choice. However, it may not tame very frizzy hair.
pros: Contains natural plant-based oils and a cross-linking polymer that smooths and locks in moisture for all types of curls, and keeps them bouncy
Can be used as a leave-in conditioner, or as a rinse
Made without harsh, drying ingredients including parabens, mineral oil, and phthalates
cons: Expensive, and you only get 6.7 ounces of product
Doesn't work as well at controlling frizz as other products we considered
